column3: ɔdɔ ndwom a ɔfa no wenyin ture ho. Mo dɔfo pa nyaa wenyin ture bi wɔ koko do asaaseber bi do."
na ɔtasee mu abo
column6: na otuu nsatwer so wɔ mu: na n’enyi daa kwan dɛ ɔbɔsow wenyinaba

column3: hom Jerusalɛmmba
column6: hom mbu emi na mo wenyin ture ntamu atsɛn."

column2: "Ebɛnadze na aka dɛ nkyɛ meyɛ mema mo wenyin ture bio a mennyɛe? M’enyi daa kwan dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɔsow wenyinaba no
column3: ɔsoow kwaa mu wenyinaba."
mebɛma hom ehu dza medze bɛyɛ mo wenyin ture no. Mibeyi no ho ban
column4: ma mbowa eedzi; mubobubu no ho ɔfasu ma woeetsiatsia do."

column3: eso wɔnnkɔdɔw ho; na obofuw nkɔkrɔw na nsoɛ: na mebɛhyɛ nsuwusiw so dɛ mma ɔnntɔ nyankom nngu do."

column2: "Dɔm EWURADZE no wenyin ture nye Israel fie
column3: na Juda mbarimba nye no kwa a n’enyi gye ho: na ɔhwɛɛ pɛrpɛryɛ kwan
column5: emimdzi nye yi; ɔhwɛɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee kwan

column3: hɔn a wɔdze ofi toa ofi do
column5: kodu dɛ ɔkwan bi nnyi hɔ
column6: na hom nkotsee tsena ase asaase do!"

column3: Ampaara

column2: "Na wenyin ture susuhoma du bɛma wenyin galɔn enum pɛr
column3: na aba kutu kɛse kor bɛma esusudze kor pɛr."
hɔn a wɔsoɛr anapahema tu enguan kedzi nsadzen ekyir; na wosi pe anadwe
akasaa
column6: wɔ hɔn aponto ase; naaso wommbu EWURADZE ne ndzeyɛe bi
column7: ne nsaano edwuma so wɔnndwendwen ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na me man etu kɔ ndɔmmum
column3: osian nyimdzee a wonnyi ntsi: na ɔkɔm dze hɔn enyimnyamfo

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na samanadze atrɛ n’akɔndɔ mu
column3: na ɔahan n’anomu petoo: ma Jerusalɛm enyimnyam
na ɔabrɛ mbarimba adze
wohuhor no wɔ pɛrpɛryɛ mu
column5: ɔda noho edzi wɔ ndzeyɛtsenenee mu."

column2: "Ɔno na nguambaa bedzidzi dɛ hɔn edzidzibea do
column3: na akobɔfo bedzi hɔn a wɔatɔ angoa no hɔn asaasefo no."
hɔn a wɔdze egyangyandze hom a twe emumuyɛ
column4: na wɔdze hwiir ntampee twe bɔn:"

column3: Wɔmma ɔnyɛ no ntsɛm ɛ
column5: wɔmma Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no n’apam mbɛn na ɔmbra ma yenhu!"

column3: hɔn a wɔfrɛ bɔn dɛ papa
column4: na papa dɛ bɔn; hɔn a wɔdze sum yɛ kan
column5: na wɔdze kan yɛ sum; hɔn a wɔdze wenwen yɛ fenemfenem

column3: hɔn a wɔyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn enyi do enyansafo
column4: na wɔyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn enyi do abadwembafo!"

column3: hɔn a wɔyɛ akatakyi wɔ nsanom mu
column4: na ahoɔdzenfo wɔ nsadzen no fora mu:"

column2: "hɔn a wobu omumuyɛnyi bem gye mboaba
column3: na wɔgye ɔtseneneenyi ne nsamu tsenenee!"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi dɛ mbrɛ ogya tɛkyerɛma dzi mburonan
column3: na gyaframee hyew nkyɛkyɛr guanee no
column4: dɛmara so na hɔn ndwow bɔprɔw
column5: na hɔn nhyiren botu afa sor dɛ huntuma: osiandɛ wɔapow dɔm EWURADZE ne mbra
column6: na woebu Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no n’asɛm enyimtsia."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE n’ebufuw redzɛw ne man do
column3: na ɔatsen ne nsa etsia hɔn
column6: na hɔn efun ayɛ dɛ abɔntsen do wura. Iyi nyinara mu
column8: na ne nsa da ho ara tsen."

column2: "Na ɔbɛma frankaa do ama amanaman a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir
column3: na ɔabɔ nhwiroma afrɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase ano noho no: na
eso obiara mmfintsiw; obiara nntɔ nkom anaa ɔnnda; hɔn asen mu abɔdo rennsan
column4: eso hɔn mpaboa ho ahoma renntsew."

column3: na hɔn egyen nyinara akonkom; wobobu hɔn mpɔnkɔ ananadze dɛ ɔtwerɛbo
column4: na hɔn nhwiir dɛ ekyinehyia mframa:"

column3: wɔbɔpɔw dɛ ngyatafɔr: nyew wɔbɔpɔw
column6: obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔbɔpɔw ahyɛ hɔn do da no dɛ po rowor: na sɛ obi hwɛ asaase a
column3: hwɛ
column5: na kan ahyɛ sum wɔ wimu hɔ."
